data.value: Empowerment
Slide to the left or right to select a sentence describing your most likely behaviour.
Foster a strong sense of ownership and responsibility
I might micromanage and/or take over tasks to be completed by others when the quality of work is poor.
I show determination and patience when dealing with lack of commitment. I ask questions to explore the disengagement causes and engage the person’s responsibility.
I foster a ‘can-do’ culture. I explore people's motivations and align their drivers to the type of activities in order to engage their responsibility.
I do not know.
Develop and offer learning experiences to others
I miss the opportunity to encourage others to learn and/or foster a status quo learning culture.
I develop a culture of continuous learning/unlearning/relearning.
I develop targeted experiences that allow others to experiment (example: temporary role assignments) and learn. I target the learning method to the person's learning style.
I do not know.
Create conditions to successfully execute tasks and activities
I miss the opportunity to explore what resources and conditions are needed for the team to achieve the objectives.
I involve others in listing the resources and conditions needed to achieve the expected results.
I clarify what success looks like. I create the conditions (organisational, resources, knowledge, ...) for others to be successful.
I do not know
Place accountability at the right level with the right person
I miss the opportunity to assess the competencies and to hold others accountable and/or to delegate tasks that others could accomplish.
I place accountability at the right lowest possible level in the organisation. I assess the competencies and capabilities required and readiness level of the person identified.
I leverage and design organisations that hold others accountable by clarifying the expectations as well as the competencies required and how they can be developed.
I do not know.
Consider mistakes and failures as a collective learning opportunity
I might blame others or ‘point fingers’ when mistakes are made and/or create a culture of fear where people bear grudges.
I call a ‘mistake’ a ‘setback’. I identify with the team/incumbent what could have been done differently.
I foster a culture where mistakes and failures might happen to those that act. I learn from them, adjust and move forward.
I do not know.
